projects.title: Ethicate - Issue blockchain secured certificates
projects.bodyText:
- **Web3** based blockchain application for education institutions and employers to issue secure and immutable digital certificates.
 - Developed using **Ethereum**, **Python**, **Flask**

projects.title: Text based search engine
projects.bodyText: - Designed a high-performance, scalable search engine capable of indexing and swiftly retrieving queries from extensive documents with **constant time** efficiency

projects.title: FUSE File System
projects.bodyText:
- A test file system that provides capabilities to CRUD files and folders on Linux volume.
 - Implemented a memory allocation algorithm 't_malloc' for faster memory allocation and garbage collection in C

projects.title: Debian Package statistics tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A python CLI application to fetch the statistics for package file usages from debian installer contents files.
 - Scrapes information from debian package mirror to get architecture specific packages stats.
 - Used the power of asynchronous programming and multithreading to improve performance.

projects.title: Real time DoS attack detection and mitigation using Snort IDS
projects.bodyText: - Developed a tool by designing honeypot framework to detect and mitigate DoS attacks using Snort IDS.

projects.title: AppWall
projects.bodyText: - Created a tool to classify packet traffic generated by a smartphone in real-time to detect and identify the applications generating unsolicited network traffic with high accuracy.
